byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and ANDY NEWMAN

abstract: Heat wave in New York City draws many people to swimming pools and neighborhood cooling centers.
lead_paragraph: A heat advisory is in effect until Thursday evening. City officials urged residents to stay hydrated and out of the sun as the temperature climbed into the 90s.

headline.main: As New York Bakes: ‘It’s Late July. This Is What It’s Supposed to Be Like.’
headline.print_headline: As the City Bakes: ‘It’s Late July. This Is What It’s Supposed to Be Like.’

snippet: A heat advisory is in effect until Thursday evening. City officials urged residents to stay hydrated and out of the sun as the temperature climbed into the 90s.
